metadata.name: Fuck Silence | SKLLMSK #1/25
metadata.description:
Fuck Silence. The Experiment  
Scream.  
edition of 25

This nft edition of 25 will shift by reworking of the OG file at random intervals. It is an on-going conceptual experiment & exploration of  impermanence, time and place on the blockchain, as well as, a comment on artist's ownership of image and what artistic evolution rooted in singularity is.  
As a holder of this NFT, when metadata/art changes and you prefer the devolved artwork over the evolved artwork, you will have opportunity to burn token and receive NFT of devolved artwork as airdrop once token  is burned.

The experiment will be over once all 25 original tokens have been burned or until I perish, whichever comes first. 

When this NFT edition evolves to a new artwork and image changes AND whether a holder requests to burn token or not a NFT of the devolved artwork will be made and held in an archived vault.
